From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Megatron fluidly back flipped over the bolt, his arm dangling
dangerously, his heavy cannon smacking his chest, but more just annoying
the tyrant. He quickly raised his still functioning arm, and his recoil
cannon folded under, and fired two blasts at the mutates legs.

--------------------------------------------------------------------
"Life support systems, stable." The computer hummed. Then a soft groan
could be heard.
